title: Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics
table: {"0":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 1500 m 1968","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":null,"6":null,"7":null,"8":"4.","9":"5.","10":"-","11":"7.","12":"8.","13":"9.","14":"10.","15":"11.","16":"12.","17":"-","18":"14.","19":"15.","20":"16.","21":"-","22":"18.","23":"19.","24":"20.","25":"21.","26":"22.","27":"23.","28":"24.","29":"-","30":"26.","31":"27.","32":"28.","33":"29.","34":"30.","35":"31.","36":"32.","37":"33.","38":"34.","39":"-","40":"36.","41":"37.","42":"38.","43":"39.","44":"40.","45":"-","46":"-","47":"43.","48":"44.","49":"45.","50":"46.","51":"47.","52":"48.","53":"49.","54":"-","55":"51.","56":"52.","57":"53.","58":null,"59":null,"60":"Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes). Skaters had to change lanes in the back straightaway of each lap in order to skate an equal distance. The skater on the outer lane had the right of way and the skater leaving the inner lane should avoid collision. The Olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 1500 m competition was held at the Anneau de Vitesse, Parc Paul Mistral and 53 athletes participated in the event.","61":null,"62":"These results for Men's 1500 m - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","63":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 1500 m 1968","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Cornelis Verkerk","6":"Ivar Eriksen","7":"Ard Schenk","8":"Magne Thomassen","9":"Johnny H\u00f6glin","10":"Bj\u00f8rn Tveter","11":"Svein-Erik Stiansen","12":"Eduard Matusevich","13":"Petrus Nottet","14":"\u00d6rjan Sandler","15":"Aleksandr Kerchenko","16":"Ants Antson","17":"Valery Kaplan","18":"Jouko Launonen","19":"G\u00fcnter Traub","20":"Jan Bols","21":"Manne Lav\u00e5s","22":"Kimmo Koskinen","23":"Richard Wurster","24":"G\u00f6ran Claeson","25":"Olavi Hjellman","26":"J\u00fcrgen Traub","27":"Wayne Arthur LeBombard","28":"William Lanigan","29":"Raimo Hietala","30":"Robert Hodges","31":"Gy\u00f6rgy Martos","32":"John Tipper","33":"Gy\u00f6rgy Ivankai","34":"Tadao Ishihata","35":"Keiichi Suzuki","36":"Giancarlo Gloder","37":"Elio Locatelli","38":"Renato De Riva","39":"Roger Capan","40":"Michel Thepenier","41":"Francois Perrenoud","42":"Guido Gillarduzzi","43":"Otmar Braunecker","44":"Hermann Strutz","45":"Masaki Suzuki","46":"Mutsuhiko Maeda","47":"Geoffrey Stockdale","48":"Erich Korbel","49":"Mihaly Martos","50":"Peter Williamson","51":"Hansr\u00fcdi Widmer","52":"Franz Krienb\u00fchl","53":"Colin Coates","54":"Luvsanlkhagvyn Dashnyam","55":"Lee Ik-hwan","56":"Bujiin Jalbaa","57":"David Bodington","58":null,"59":null,"60":"Men's 1500 m - Speed Skating - Grenoble 1968 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced against the clock although they raced in pairs on separate lanes on an oval rink (inner and outer lanes).
